introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to BetAIOne. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our AI-powered sports betting analysis platform.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.personalizedContent: Deliver customized content and match analysis
howWeUse.serviceImprovement: Improve our platform and AI algorithms
howWeUse.security: Maintain platform security and prevent fraud

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
informationSharing.intro: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
informationSharing.serviceProviders: With trusted service providers who assist in platform operations
informationSharing.legalRequirements: When required by law or legal process
informationSharing.businessTransfer: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information, including encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

ageVerification.title: Age Verification
ageVerification.content: Our platform is intended for users 18 years and older. We implement age verification measures to ensure compliance with legal requirements and responsible gambling practices.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage patterns, and provide personalized content. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on our platform and updating the 'Last Updated' date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

disclaimer.title: Important Notice
disclaimer.content: This platform is for entertainment and informational purposes only. Betting involves risk and should be done responsibly. Please comply with local laws and regulations.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to BetAIOne, an AI-powered sports betting analysis platform. These Terms of Service govern your use of our website, mobile application, and related services. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these terms.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By creating an account, accessing, or using our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy.

serviceDescription.title: Service Description
serviceDescription.intro: BetAIOne provides AI-powered sports betting analysis and recommendations. Our services include:
serviceDescription.contentCuration: Curated sports content and market analysis

ageRequirements.title: Age Requirements
ageRequirements.content: You must be at least 18 years old to use our platform. By using our services, you represent and warrant that you meet this age requirement and have the legal capacity to enter into these terms.

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
userAccounts.intro: To access certain features, you must create an account. You are responsible for:

responsibilities.title: Account Responsibilities
responsibilities.secure: Maintaining the security of your account credentials
responsibilities.notify: Notifying us of any unauthorized access
responsibilities.liable: All activities that occur under your account

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use Policy
acceptableUse.intro: You agree not to use our platform for any unlawful or prohibited activities, including:

prohibited.title: Prohibited Activities
prohibited.illegal: Any illegal activities or violations of applicable laws
prohibited.harassment: Harassment, abuse, or harm to other users
prohibited.spam: Sending spam, unsolicited communications, or advertisements
prohibited.impersonation: Impersonating others or providing false information
prohibited.malware: Distributing malware, viruses, or harmful code
prohibited.minors: Facilitating access by minors to age-restricted content
prohibited.interference: Interfering with platform operations or security

aiRecommendations.title: AI Recommendations Disclaimer
aiRecommendations.intro: Our AI-powered recommendations are for informational and entertainment purposes only.

disclaimer.title: Important Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: AI recommendations do not guarantee outcomes. All betting involves risk, and you should never bet more than you can afford to lose. Past performance does not indicate future results.

privacyData.title: Privacy and Data Protection
privacyData.content: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.ownership: All content, features, and functionality on our platform are owned by BetAIOne and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
intellectualProperty.userContent: By submitting content to our platform, you grant us a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, modify, and display such content in connection with our services.

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.content: Our platform is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of any content or recommendations. Use our services at your own risk.

limitationLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationLiability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, BetAIOne shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of our platform.

termination.title: Termination
termination.byUser: You may terminate your account at any time by contacting us or using account settings.
termination.byUs: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms or engage in prohibited activities.
termination.effect: Upon termination, your right to use our services will cease immediately, and we may delete your account and data.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These terms are governed by and construed in accordance with applicable laws. Any disputes will be resolved through binding arbitration or in courts of competent jurisdiction.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of material changes, and continued use of our platform constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

effectiveDate.title: Effective Date
effectiveDate.content: These Terms of Service are effective as of the date of your first use of our platform and will remain in effect until terminated in accordance with these terms.
